entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 a.m. MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.5Â°C

Observed at: Edson Airport 12:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
